title: Μαύρα Μεσάνυχτα
overview: Thrasos' family becames inheritor of his dead brother, Apostolis, house and nightclub. But also he takes over the mafia of his brother. Everyday new troubles appear with police. Silvi the ex girlfriend of Apostolis, trying to take control more than the 5% of the club. Murders, fights and forbiden loves take place everyday. Last his wife, gothic daughter and teenage son keep making the things worse.
